body.p: Gentoo Linux is available free over the Internet. You can download Gentoo Linux from one of our mirrors or, if you prefer BitTorrent, you may see a list of available torrents at torrents.gentoo.org.
Please consult our Gentoo Handbooks for more information on what to download and how to install Gentoo.

The Gentoo Store sells high-quality Gentoo-related products, including our release sets and even DVD sets. For each sale, a portion of the profits go directly to the Gentoo Foundation to support Gentoo development efforts, server infrastructure, etc.

We offer "official" boxed versions of Gentoo Linux for sale in our store. Purchases made from this store go directly to supporting future development of Gentoo Linux.
